title: Dinnerbone: 船将会比疾跑更快
author: obby825
txt_content:
1.png (60.95 KB, 下载次数: 11)

下载附件

2015-10-8 23:04 上传





Dinnerbone: "The new boats are too slow!" I hear you! They're going to be slightly faster than sprinting, without any of the hunger costs :)
Dinnerbone: “新的船太慢了！”我听到了你们的声音！它们将会比疾跑更快一点，而且你的饥饿度不会下降 :)
Dinnerbone: Also, you'll be able to make them go much faster by tapping at the right rhythm. Boat races will be a thing!
Dinnerbone: 并且，如果你按照正确的节奏按下操纵键的话可以更快一点。赛船将成为可能！
